data.name: customSqlQuery1.Sql
data.value:
--declare @Baslangic date ='2014.01.01'; --declare @Bitis date ='2014.01.31'; --declare @BaslangicBorsaSube varchar(max)='01'; --declare @BitisBorsaSube varchar(max)='99'; --declare @Cek int =10;
with tablo1 as (select top (@Cek) 'EN FAZLA ISLEM GOREN İLK '+cast(@Cek as varchar(max))+' ÜRÜN' as Baslik, 'T.C. '+PBB.BorsaAdi+' TİCARET BORSASI' as BorsaAdi, MK.Adi as UrunAdi, BT.Kod as Birim, count(*) as IslemSayi, min(B.BeyanSatisTutari) as AltFiyat, max(B.BeyanSatisTutari) as UstFiyat, avg(B.BeyanSatisTutari) as OrtFiyat, case when sum(B.CanliHayvanAdet)=0 then sum(B.BeyanMiktar) else sum(B.CanliHayvanAdet) end as Miktar, sum(b.BeyanMiktar) as Adet, sum(b.BeyanSatisTutari) as Tutar, sum(B.SimsariyeMiktar) as SatOrgH, sum(B.TescilMiktar) as TescilUcreti from [MERKEZ_BORSA].[BEYAN] as B inner join [MERKEZ_BORSA].[TT_MADDE_KOD] as MK on B.MaddeKodKey=MK.MaddeKodKey left join [MERKEZ_BORSA].[TT_BIRIM_TIP] as BT on B.BirimTipKey=BT.BirimTipKey left join [MERKEZ_BORSA].[TT_BORSA_SUBE] as BS on BS.BorsaSubeKey=B.BorsaSubeKey cross join [PROGRAM].[BORSA_BILGI] as PBB where B.BeyanTarihi between @Baslangic and @Bitis and CAST(BS.Kod as int) between CAST(@BaslangicBorsaSube as int) and CAST(@BitisBorsaSube as int) group by BorsaAdi,MK.Adi,BT.Kod order by IslemSayi desc ), tablo2 as (select top (@Cek) 'EN FAZLA TOPLAM MİKTARA SAHİP İLK '+cast(@Cek as varchar(max))+' ÜRÜN' as Baslik, 'T.C. '+PBB.BorsaAdi+' TİCARET BORSASI' as BorsaAdi, MK.Adi as UrunAdi, BT.Kod as Birim, count(*) as IslemSayi, min(B.BeyanSatisTutari) as AltFiyat, max(B.BeyanSatisTutari) as UstFiyat, avg(B.BeyanSatisTutari) as OrtFiyat, case when sum(B.CanliHayvanAdet)=0 then sum(B.BeyanMiktar) else sum(B.CanliHayvanAdet) end as Miktar, sum(b.BeyanMiktar) as Adet, sum(b.BeyanSatisTutari) as Tutar, sum(B.SimsariyeMiktar) as SatOrgH, sum(B.TescilMiktar) as TescilUcreti from [MERKEZ_BORSA].[BEYAN] as B inner join [MERKEZ_BORSA].[TT_MADDE_KOD] as MK on B.MaddeKodKey=MK.MaddeKodKey left join [MERKEZ_BORSA].[TT_BIRIM_TIP] as BT on B.BirimTipKey=BT.BirimTipKey left join [MERKEZ_BORSA].[TT_BORSA_SUBE] as BS on BS.BorsaSubeKey=B.BorsaSubeKey cross join [PROGRAM].[BORSA_BILGI] as PBB where B.BeyanTarihi between @Baslangic and @Bitis and CAST(BS.Kod as int) between CAST(@BaslangicBorsaSube as int) and CAST(@BitisBorsaSube as int) group by BorsaAdi,MK.Adi,BT.Kod order by Miktar desc ), tablo3 as (select top (@Cek) 'EN FAZLA TOPLAM TUTARA SAHİP İLK '+cast(@Cek as varchar(max))+' ÜRÜN' as Baslik, 'T.C. '+PBB.BorsaAdi+' TİCARET BORSASI' as BorsaAdi, MK.Adi as UrunAdi, BT.Kod as Birim, count(*) as IslemSayi, min(B.BeyanSatisTutari) as AltFiyat, max(B.BeyanSatisTutari) as UstFiyat, avg(B.BeyanSatisTutari) as OrtFiyat, case when sum(B.CanliHayvanAdet)=0 then sum(B.BeyanMiktar) else sum(B.CanliHayvanAdet) end as Miktar, sum(b.BeyanMiktar) as Adet, sum(b.BeyanSatisTutari) as Tutar, sum(B.SimsariyeMiktar) as SatOrgH, sum(B.TescilMiktar) as TescilUcreti from [MERKEZ_BORSA].[BEYAN] as B inner join [MERKEZ_BORSA].[TT_MADDE_KOD] as MK on B.MaddeKodKey=MK.MaddeKodKey left join [MERKEZ_BORSA].[TT_BIRIM_TIP] as BT on B.BirimTipKey=BT.BirimTipKey left join [MERKEZ_BORSA].[TT_BORSA_SUBE] as BS on BS.BorsaSubeKey=B.BorsaSubeKey cross join [PROGRAM].[BORSA_BILGI] as PBB where B.BeyanTarihi between @Baslangic and @Bitis and CAST(BS.Kod as int) between CAST(@BaslangicBorsaSube as int) and CAST(@BitisBorsaSube as int) group by BorsaAdi,MK.Adi,BT.Kod order by Tutar desc ) select * from tablo1 union select * from tablo2 union select * from tablo3
